attributes.action: Close shopping malls IMMEDIATELY to prevent the spread of COVID-19
attributes.background: Due to the rapid spread of COVID-19, I believe our government should take further action and close all shopping centres in Ontario. We need to understand that social distancing is very important and all of us need to work together to stop the spread of Coronavirus.

rejection.details:
We've tried to get in touch with you to talk about your petition but we didn't hear back. 

You can get in touch with us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk if you'd like to resubmit your petition and want to talk about the contents first.
